snippet.textDisplay: So if he didn't stand on trial for said crime 🤔 is there a crime ? The Sun seem to say so . Are they accustomed to  print fake news and call it fact ! I'm curious to know  ? So now when I read the Sun I question everything in print as either fake or just sensationiizing the event that they are covering . If  the Sun has factual  proof  why isn't it  available?  The UK judge was to quick to pass judgment before all  the evidence was in ? Well I hope and pray that I'm wrong but I feel MR DEPP was railroaded into this by his ex  Miss pooped in the bed  . Opinions are juts that everyone has one.  Quit making  stuff up and speak  the damn truth . If she actually had  k .....d  him probably  would of got away with it  .opinion only folks you have a brain you decide for yourself who is to blame in all this  . Going long now for how many years ? Appeal  Appeal  Appeal  Appeal  horse feathers  its like a broken record  peal a onion yeah then the tears would be real . What could be worse than this ? If it was a movie  🎥!  And then even Appeal a sequel  !  OPINION  !
